WorkItem.Description:
Using tsc 1.0.1.0:

`MyModule.ts`:

    import MyModule = require('MyModule');

Then compile as AMD:

    tsc -m amd MyModule.ts

Fails with error:

>/usr/local/lib/node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc.js:0
>(function (exports, require, module, __filename, __dirname) { /*! ************
>^
>RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded

Process exit code is 8.

**EDIT**

Just realised this has moved to GitHub. I've migrated the issue there:

https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/806
WorkItem.Summary: RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded with self-referential module
